name: Mohammed Essaid MEZERREG
tagline: Feeding the hunger of my brain!
body:
I am a simple and enthusiastic developer holding a master in computer science engineering. I can't wrap my day without reading about a new concept in this field and writing a line of code for `my||our||their||x` projects. That's it!
***
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
